short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable deep dark mode for web pages and dev tools. Saves energy with OLED screens like on Mac M1 Pro.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlaCKout by Active Bridge: Elevate Your Screen, Empower Your Vision

Transform your browsing experience with BlaCKout, the creative dark mode extension for web developers, tech enthusiasts, and every visionary in between. Crafted by Active Bridge, BlaCKout is more than just an extension – it's a commitment to a smarter, more sustainable digital world.

Why choose BlaCKout?

- Open Source: https://github.com/galulex/deepdark

- Unmatched dark mode experience: dive into the deepest dark mode available. Whether you're coding, reading, or exploring, BlaCKout offers unparalleled comfort for your eyes, especially on OLED screens like the Mac M1 Pro.

- Energy efficient: designed for OLED technology, BlaCKout significantly reduces screen energy consumption, aligning with your eco-conscious lifestyle.

- User-centric design: intuitive and effortless. Toggle dark mode with a simple click, or switch back to light for selected websites. It's customization at your fingertips.

- Innovative tabless browsing: embrace a cleaner, more organized digital workspace with our special tabless mode – where every tab is a new window, reducing clutter and enhancing focus.

At Active Bridge, we combine cutting-edge technology with a human touch. BlaCKout is not just a tool; it's a gateway to a more comfortable, energy-efficient, and user-friendly digital environment. It's where innovation meets intuition, design meets functionality, and technology meets sustainability.
